content: *these lovely chrysanthemum dishcloths are sure to become a part of your kitchen decor yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** ** lily version ** -lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds -and- -lily® sugar n cream® ombres 56 7 g/2 oz 86 m/95 yds main color mc mauve or red *1 ball* -and- contrast a ombre *1 ball* ** bernat version ** -bernat® handicrafter® cotton 50 g/1 75 oz 73 m/80 yds -and- -bernat® handicrafter® cotton ombres 42 g/1 5 oz 62 m/68 yds *version 1 * * main color mc hot orange 13628 *1 ball* * contrast a white 00001 *1 ball* *version 2 * * main color mc banana yellow 00089 *1 ball* * contrast a playtime 23741 *1 ball* *version 3 * * main color mc banana yellow 00089 *1 ball* * contrast a summer splash 23743 *1 ball* french pdf version 1 --- the crochet crowd video tutorial 2 1 https //pdfhall com/bernata-handicrafter-cotton-lavette-aws_5ab057a71723ddde372466aa html 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=uozuzl3_rkw
